tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: Just a reminder that Grindlewald: 1. Threw a little creature who loved him out from a great height to its death. 2. Killed a...
body:
Just a reminder that Grindlewald:

1. Threw a little creature who loved him out from a great height to its death.

2. Killed a child. 

While the Grindledore ship may be attractive to many of you, I just want to say that Dumbledore deserves far better than a man like this.

blog.description:
Chago ▪ LGBT+ 🏳️‍🌈 ▪ 90's kid ▪ viva la raza 🇲🇽 ▪ capricorne ♑ ▪ trop de tohu-bohu dans ma tête ▪ je raconte ma vie ▪ disney folk ▪ manga/anime ▪ slytherin 🐍 ▪ thunderbird ▪ fox patronus 🦊 ▪ pro snape ▪ potterhead ▪ house blackwood of raventree hall ▪ sandor sassy clegane lover ▪ game of thrones addict ▪ team cats ▪ histoire de l'art et lettres classiques ▪ cinephile ▪ livrovore ▪ pop culture ▪ geek sa mère ▪ vive le café ▪ procrastination ▪ bienveillance et tolérance ▪ safe place ▪ haters not welcome here ▪  ce blog (et son contenu) n'engage que moi ▪
"Le bien que l'on fait parfume l'âme." (Victor Hugo)
✴ Obscurus Et Sine Gloria ✴

summary:
Alan Rickman (21 February 1946 - Always)
Aujourd'hui, j'ai une pensée particulière pour Alan Rickman, dont c'est...
body:
Alan Rickman (21 February 1946 - Always)

Aujourd'hui, j'ai une pensée particulière pour Alan Rickman, dont c'est l'anniversaire.

Son talent, sa tolérance et sa générosité en faisaient une personne rare.

Il restera pour toujours un modèle à suive pour moi.

Alan Rickman à jamais dans nos coeurs ❤

🌹 🌹 🌹

Today, I have a special thought for Alan Rickman, whose birthday it is.

His talent, tolerance and generosity made him a rare person.

He’ll remain forever a model to follow for me.

Alan Rickman forever in our hearts ❤

🌺 🌺 🌺

blog.name: my-heart-wont-go-on
blog.title: A Super Snazzy Mess
blog.description: Nemo | Bisexual | She/Her I write Fanfic I guess. Masterlist. Feel free to request, there's a link to what fandoms I'll write for somewhere.

body:
Leave Right Now (DRARRY)

A/N: Hiiii! This is probably angsty but idk how good I am at writing angst so yeah. There is some swearing btw. Also possible trigger warnings because there’s homophobia from multiple characters and Draco is pretty much kicked out of his home because his homophobic father. This was pretty upsetting to write, just a warning. There will be a part 2 (maybe).

So this is the first of some of the things I’m uploading from my Wattpad to here, enjoy.

Draco’s father had been the main role model in his life, even if he wasn’t a very good one. Lucius was homophobic. So when Draco started to fall in love with the one and only Harry Potter, he was terrified. 6 months later and Draco was head-over-heels in love with Harry, and they’d been dating for almost 4 months. Harry didn’t have parents to meet and Draco would probably never be ready for his boyfriend to meet the family, especially as his boyfriend was the one who had defeated ‘He Who Must Not Be Named’, who his parents had worked for and worshipped. Draco was content was where their relationship was, and when he’d asked, Harry had agreed with him. Harry had also agreed to meet Draco in Hogsmead for a date that weekend.

Harry saw his boyfriend slouched against the wall of Honeydukes, where they’d planned to meet. “Hey, there, luv.” Harry greeted the blond haired boy, pecking him on the lips softly.

“Hey, babe. Ready to go?”

“Sure.” Draco grabbed his hand hand tugged him towards The Three Broomsticks, before ordering butterbeers for both of them (I had one of those as a kid, i didn’t like it but I wonder if I would now?), Harry’s favourite, he knew. Harry sat quietly, watching the people in the pub, occasionally looking at his boyfriend, making sure he was okay, and seeing Dean and Seamus huddled closely in a booth in the corner, grinned and waved at them. Draco sat at the table, his shoulder and leg touching Harry’s. “Here you are, luv.”

“Thanks, Dray.” (as a short for Draco, idk about that but I’ve heard its a thing people do).

“Anything for y-” Draco was cut off by Pansy Parkinson sitting opposite them on their little table.

“Hi, Draco. How are you doing? Just thought I’d check in on you for your father, I wonder what he’d think about this.” she said, her voice quiet and malicious.

“Draco, what does she mean?” Harry turns to his boyfriend, shocked (shook more like).

“Nothing, she’s just bitter that I rejected her, even though I made it clear I wasn’t into women.” Draco told the Gryffindor, side-eyeing the hell out of Pansy. “My father is homophobic, though, that’s why I didn’t want you meeting my parents. Finished your drink, babe? I think we should leave right now. Don’t need this toxic shit, I get enough of it at home.”

“Okay, luv. Let’s go.” Hand in hand, they walk the deserted lane back to the castle.

Draco sees a flash of long platinum blond hair as they enter through the Great Hall, rather surprised, he notes the look of contempt as his father looks at Draco, Harry, then Draco again and finally the held hands between them. “Father.” Draco mutters coldly. “What a surprise. Why are you here?”

“I’ve heard, from a rather reliable source, that you two have been getting very cosy lately. I have to say Draco, I’m very disappointed in you. I’ve tried to raise you well, and this is how you repay me? I’m ashamed of you.” Lucius Malfoy snarls.

“There is nothing wrong with me, you git! You didn’t raise me well, you raised me with trust issues, and as a snob, and with pain. Harry helped me through that, he respects me for who I am and want to be, he cares about me, he sees the best in me and he doesn’t try and manipulate me! You are a bad father so don’t you dare try and tell me that!” He screams at his father, so blinded by rage, he doesn’t see Harry tearing up beside him.

“You little… How dare you! After all I’ve done for you!” Lucius storms out. As does Draco, holding back tears, running away from his father, Harry and everything that just happened.

Harry hurries through the corridors looking for his beloved. He comes to an empty classroom and hears a sobbing from within. Before he can enter, Peeves bobs out through the wall, muttering what sounds like 'touchy touchy’

“Sod off, you ghosty git.” Harry says to the poltergeist, as the spirit whizzes away. He pushes the door of the classroom open with a soft “Draco?”. When no one reply but the sobbing grows louder, Harry pushes the door fully open. “Draco, I know you probably want some time alone, but I just want to make sure that your alright.”

“Of course I’m not alright, Harry. My father, the person I’ve been trying to make proud for all of my life, has pretty much just disowned me, and called me a disappointment. Do you think I’m all right?!” Draco looks at him incredulous and angry. Looking startled and bemused, his heart heavy and sad, but full of love too, Harry stares at him, Draco only really ever called him by his actually name before their relationship and early on.

“Look I’m sorry. I just wanted to know how you’re doing.”

“I think you’d better leave right now, Harry. I don’t have time for this bullshit. Thank you for your concern, now go.” when the messy haired Gryffindor doesn’t move Draco yells at him. As Harry exits the classroom, Draco hears him whisper something.

“I think I better leave right now. Before I fall right now. I think I better leave right now. I’m feeling weaker and weaker.”

“Nothing, she’s just bitter that I rejected her, even though I made it clear I wasn’t into women.” Draco told the Gryffindor, side-eyeing the hell out of Pansy. “My father is homophobic, though, that’s why I didn’t want you meeting my parents. Finished your drink, babe? I think we should leave right now. Don’t need this toxic shit, I get enough of it at home.”

“Okay, luv. Let’s go.” Hand in hand, they walk the deserted lane back to the castle.

Draco sees a flash of long platinum blond hair as they enter through the Great Hall, rather surprised, he notes the look of contempt as his father looks at Draco, Harry, then Draco again and finally the held hands between them. “Father.” Draco mutters coldly. “What a surprise. Why are you here?”

Harry helped me through that, he respects me for who I am and want to be, he cares about me, he sees the best in me and he doesn’t try and manipulate me! You are a bad father so don’t you dare try and tell me that!” He screams at his father, so blinded by rage, he doesn’t see Harry tearing up beside him.

“You little… How dare you! After all I’ve done for you!” Lucius storms out. As does Draco, holding back tears, running away from his father, Harry and everything that just happened.

Harry hurries through the corridors looking for his beloved. He comes to an empty classroom and hears a sobbing from within. Before he can enter, Peeves bobs out through the wall, muttering what sounds like 'touchy touchy’

“Sod off, you ghosty git.” Harry says to the poltergeist, as the spirit whizzes away. He pushes the door of the classroom open with a soft “Draco?”. When no one reply but the sobbing grows louder, Harry pushes the door fully open. “Draco, I know you probably want some time alone, but I just want to make sure that your alright.”

“Of course I’m not alright, Harry. My father, the person I’ve been trying to make proud for all of my life, has pretty much just disowned me, and called me a disappointment. Do you think I’m all right?!” Draco looks at him incredulous and angry. Looking startled and bemused, his heart heavy and sad, but full of love too, Harry stares at him, Draco only really ever called him by his actually name before their relationship and early on.

“Look I’m sorry. I just wanted to know how you’re doing.”

“I think you’d better leave right now, Harry. I don’t have time for this bullshit. Thank you for your concern, now go.” when the messy haired Gryffindor doesn’t move Draco yells at him. As Harry exits the classroom, Draco hears him whisper something.

“I think I better leave right now. Before I fall right now. I think I better leave right now. I’m feeling weaker and weaker.”

blog.name: ao3feed-tomarrymort
blog.title: Tomarrymort On AO3
blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

summary: For Better, or Worse, we Change
title: For Better, or Worse, we Change
description:
by EmmaMoriarty58

Have you ever died? well, it’s not fun. Neither is reincarnation. What was worse than both of these combined? Well, having an age old witch out for your head, your soulmate being the bloody Dark Lord, strange memories she didn’t remember and three eccentric people confusing the hell out of anybody! Fem!Harry. AU.

Words: 7799, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Tom Riddle, Hermione Granger, Ginny Weasley, Luna Lovegood, Albus Dumbledore, Draco Malfoy, Lily Evans Potter, Severus Snape, Merlin (Harry Potter), Morgana | Morgan le Fay (Harry Potter)
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Tom Riddle, Hermione Granger/Draco Malfoy, Luna Lovegood/Ginny Weasley, Albus Dumbledore/Gellert Grindelwald
  • Additional Tags: Female Harry Potter

Fem!Harry. AU.

blog.name: rachelundefined
blog.title: RachelUndefined
blog.description:
Who am I? Can anyone really answer that question? I don't know who I am. I'm undefined.

What am I into? My biggest, but by no means only, passion is HP fanfics. My interests are many and varied, and my posts reflect my diversity.

Will our interests correspond? Only you can answer that question. Or will you, like myself, remain undefined?

blog.name: 12dancingwizards
blog.title: Sirius Black Is Gay
blog.description:
Jk Rowling who? Idk her.

All the characters are now queer poc and anyone who disagrees can fight me. I’m here for positivity about all the houses and running Snape over with my truck. Asks, messages, and submissions are super welcome!! I wanna interact with my followers!

Mod is a lesbian nonbinary slytherin if you were wondering. They/them pronouns please!

Also this is a sideblog. Main is @glitch-h Icon credit: @alessiajontrunfio

tags: like no they werent (that) gay for each other
it just sort of happened u know
i kissed plenty of my platonic friends so
i like to imagine that one of them panicking over possibly kissing either lily or remus
and the other was like ‘’omg just practice on me and shut up’’

blog.description:
| Snape is my son and Alan is my father |
sninsta: @thatbastardrickman

summary: "There aren't many actors who would go to such lengths for the integrity of their character. There were deep and heart-breaking...
body:
“There aren’t many actors who would go to such lengths for the integrity of their character. There were deep and heart-breaking reasons why Snape didn’t smile, why he is such a loner and the most stubbornly emo adult ever. I so appreciate the fact that he cared that much about his character, that he didn’t dismiss Harry Potter as a ‘kids film’, a handy job and a sizeable paycheck. He loved and honoured Snape the way all beloved characters deserve and he made the Harry Potter that much more real for us. ”

-Evanna Lynch on Alan Rickman passing away

reblog.comment:

He loved and honoured Snape the way all beloved characters deserve and he made the Harry Potter that much more real for us. ”

summary: Drarry Discord Writer’s Corner Drabble Challenge - feb-19
body:
Drarry Discord Writer’s Corner Drabble Challenge - feb-19

Coffee

Prompt: First(s)

word count: 218

Thanks to MalenkayaCherepakha for the beta work!

(Silly me, I posted here a link to AO3 but not the drabble )

—   

At seven A.M. in the morning the Ministry was blessedly empty.

Draco liked to be the first one to arrive, that way he could avoid the disgusted faces before his morning coffee. Many people couldn’t forget the mark that was once on his arm. Sometimes he even forgets that the ugly thing disappeared with its maker’s demise, leaving his skin scarred in mock reminder of his stupidity.That morning he found someone else already there though. On his desk. Apparently taking a nap.

“Potter” He woke up startled, sleep heavy on his face, black hair a catastrophe. It was… unsettling for reasons he couldn’t fathom. Potter put on his glasses and looked at him.

“Draco” His brain stopped working and didn’t register Potter’s next words. “Do you have the Periwinkle case report?”

“What?”

“About that light blue potion?” Draco blinked several times, he struggled to catch up.

“I’m… still running tests.” Potter rubbed his hands over his face. “Ok, please send it to me when you have it”

“Sure.” On impulse Draco handed him his cup of coffee. “Here, you need it more than me.”

To make things worse the other man groaned in pleasure. “I could kiss you. Don’t forget to send it!” Potter left the room savouring the beverage.

What the hell had just happened?

title: Nothing Breaks Like A Slytherin - Heart
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GAisx5

by KMZ

Wollt ihr wissen, wie es dazu kam, dass Severus Snape seine vergötterte Lily als „Schlammblut“, beschimpft hat? Wollt ihr wissen, was Narcissa Black und Lucius Malfoy mit all dem zu tun haben? Und wollt ihr wissen, wer wirklich die Schuld am Tod Lily Potters hat? Dann lest meine abgewandelte Version der Geschehnisse! °°°Weitere Infos im Vorwort. °°°Pairings: Severus Snape x Lucius Malfoy °°°SS x LM°°°(und weitere pairings)

summary: The height thing is based on kind of a joking debate among people who are fans of Severus Snape. We debate whether he is talk or...
question: The height thing is based on kind of a joking debate among people who are fans of Severus Snape. We debate whether he is talk or short but mostly in jokes. We don’t really know if he is tall or short because movie Snape is quite tall but book Snape/the man Snape was based on were not.
answer: Ah, now it all makes sense. I didn’t know there was debate over his height of all things. This makes me happy. Glad we’re not always on about the angsty shit.♥
